summary: Another set of tweeks for Shadowmere with one special feature unlike all others! Shadowmere will not only not attack or run away but she will be completely ignored by all hostile creatures and NPCs!
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29y1qv9.png[/IMG]
[color=9b7850][size=4]Another set of tweeks for Shadowmere with one special feature unlike all others! Shadowmere will not only not attack or run away but she will be completely ignored by all hostile creatures and NPCs!

Now with Dawnguard Ready Version!
See the Optional Files Section to Download![/size][/color][/center]

[size=3][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]

Shadowmere will no longer fight anything or run away from anything. She\'ll stay where you leave her and no more having your kills stolen!

Shadowmere will no longer be attacked by anything. Fight your own battles without Shadowmere tanking everything for you!

Shadowmere cannot die by any means and you cannot be hurt by falling when mounted on Shadowmere. Jump off cliffs and charge through battles!

Shadowmere also runs 20% faster than normal and can sprint/gallop for what seems like forever. 

Enjoy!


[size=3][b][u]Other Versions[/u][/b][/size]

If you want Shadowmere to still be attackable check out my previous version [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10863]Here[/url]

If you want all your horses to be like this check out \"Oblivious Horses\" [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13036]Here[/url]


[size=3][b][u]Update Notes[/u][/b][/size]

~~1.1 - Fixed an issue that was causing bandit class NPCs to still attack Shadowmere

~~1.2 - Removed unneeded form edits.

[u]Other Notes[/u]
No longer supported. I do not plan to purchase Hearthfire due to a personal distaste for the product and so cannot mod with the new content. This mod should still work with unexpanded Skyrim (and Dawnguard if noted as such). Sorry for any inconvenience but with this game being almost a year old I feel it\'s time to move on to newer modding horizons. Thank you to everyone who downloaded and enjoyed my Skyrim mods. I hope to see you all again in other mod workshops. Best wishes!
author: KahjiitRaj
